0.1.name: wordpress/genesis-admin-bar-addition
0.1.description: This plugin adds an extra menu full of links about the StudioPress Genesis Framework to your Toolbar. The menus are translatable and the output of the menu is now filterable. Now you can quickly navigate to any and all resource links on the StudioPress site from the comfort of your Genesis powered website.
